query_tasks.name: 结直肠癌相关的生物标志物研究
query_tasks.query: (biomarker[ti] OR marker[ti] OR diagnosis[ti] OR diagnostic[ti] OR prognosis[ti] OR prognostic[ti] OR indicat*[ti] OR predict*[ti] OR forecast*[ti] OR anticipate*[ti] OR target*[ti]) AND (colorectal[ti] OR colon[ti] OR rectal[ti] OR rectum[ti]) AND (tumor[ti] OR neoplasm[ti] OR cancer[ti] OR carcinoma[ti] OR malignancy[ti]) AND (2023/08/03[Date - Publication] : 2023/08/07[Date - Publication])
query_tasks.description: 结直肠癌相关的生物标志物研究，时间范围 2023 年 8 月 3 日 - 7 日

query_tasks.name: 放射性肠道毒性研究
query_tasks.query: (toxicities[ti] OR injury[ti] OR damage[ti] OR toxicity[ti] OR enteritis[ti]) AND (radiation[ti] OR radio*[ti]) AND (colorectal[ti] OR colon[ti] OR rectal[ti] OR rectum[ti] OR bowel[ti] OR intestine[ti] OR gastrointestinal[ti] OR intestinal[ti]) AND (2023/08/01[Date - Publication] : 2023/08/31[Date - Publication])
query_tasks.description: 放射性肠道毒性研究，时间范围 2023 年 8 月 1 日 - 31 日
